text:
hey Everyone.

I want to retrieve all data from the Analytics tool/website visits through the API. Is there an endpoint available for this?

Thanks for your help.
Donát

Hey Guys,
We are using forms  using API. However when we are trying to access records under HubSpot we are getting this 2 errors.
1. This custom form submission didn't include an IP address. This could affect your form analytics.
2. The cookie needed to link form submissions to existing contacts isn't being sent. You'll need to ask your developer to update the integration for this form.
Is there any way to resolve this errors? As we are loosing analytics after using API.

hey guys, a question for probably HubSpot team.

The <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/properties|properties API >allows creation of enumeration fields which, when created, can be set to externalOptions = true, which makes options in the dropdown to look at the contacts, deals, customer or owners table like in the docs example

Can this be made with custom created records.

We are getting failure when using single, plural or custom id with 2-xxxxx

thanks

Hello HubSpot team, can someone help me with this?. I have problems adding the Blog transcript audio file to the Blogs API response. Thanks in advance
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Blog-Post-API-Response/m-p/1058537#M77574>

Hi <@U07051YPXEZ> - this Slack isn't monitored by the HubSpot team so you can try posting in the <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/|HubSpot Dev Forum> or send your <https://developers.HubSpot.com/feedback|feedback here>
Thanks SJ, still if anyone has something to add, please do post

<#C2YHAHB6K|api>
【Can someone tell me about using Communication Intelligence (CI) using API】

Hi Everyone,

I'm Kaitani from bricks, working as a Solution Partner at HubSpot Japan.

SalesHub's CI is currently not available in Japan. (There are no marketplace apps in Japan that support CI.)

I would like to use the HubSpot API to upload audio recorded data from ZoomPhone to CI.

However, there is no information about CI in the HubSpot API documentation.

I would like to know how I can use CI through the HubSpot API and if there is any documentation.

Thank you for your support.
